siteDoc.appDescr: Образцов Дом is a site for home organization. It helps the distribution of chores, facilitates communication in the household and turns your home into a Model Home!
siteDoc.appSignIn: Register now and enjoy all the possibilities of Образцов Дом!
siteDoc.appForumAd: The app features a forum, allowing you to quickly and easily share ideas, distribute tasks, and exchange information with your household!
siteDoc.appCalendarAd: Organize events effortlessly with our app. Synchronize calendars, track events, and plan together with your household. Turn planning into a pleasure!
siteDoc.appGroceryAd: Facilitate your shopping by creating a shared grocery list with household members and plan your shopping together!
siteDoc.possibilities: Some of the things our website offers:
